contents:
1018 Outgoing NYC Mayor Eric Adams to allow fired COVID workers to get jobs back (justthenews.com) posted 3 days ago by Sea_Still 24 comments award share report block Outgoing NYC Mayor Eric Adams to allow fired COVID workers to get jobs back Adams, who steps down on Dec. 31, said he is giving about 2,900 city workers who were fired during the pandemic over their refusal to get vaccinated another shot at coming back to work as he prepares to depart City Hall. justthenews.com
